AGPBI: {qwertyjsdfghsdfgsdfgsdfgsdfgsdfsdfdfbdfbfbdfbfvb(1) java is made by oracle.
(2) java is a compiled and interpreter both language. first code is compiled (only syntax is checked but it is not converted to machine language) than interpreted ( means now converted to machine language and then object file is executed.) therefore 2 types of errors : 1.compile time error 2.interpreter language
(3) in java , class contains a bundle of all function which we can call using objects .
(4) java is slow as compared to c .
(5) JRE JVM JDK => jdk= it is required to develop application in java. ->when we download jdk , jre is also downloaded with it. ->jre , jdk also contains a no. of development tools.
=> jre= it stands for java runtime environment. -> it is superset of jvm as jvm is present in jre.
=>jvm= java virtual machine ->it converts java bytes codes(java compiler converts code written by user to java bytes codes) to machine cocdes .
